IndexTermsPage.title: A Concurrency Model for Transaction Management.
IndexTermsPage.abstract: Various mechanisms, such as locking, time-stamped based algorithms, optimistic methods, versioning, have been used to support data consistency in transactions. Depending on the application s environment, InterBase offers the choices of two models for tran
